data.title: Great atmosphere
data.text: During the first weekend in May on the square in Murfreesboro they have Jazzfest. We always go in Liquid Smoke before the Kentucky Derby starts and settle into a prime spot and have a few ice cold beers and watch the race.It's one of the few times I have cigar. They have these great filter fans that clean the air so you can't tell anyone is smoking. It's great and the bath room will blow you away.Your woman will love it and its coed so you both can check it out just don't stay in there to long.

data.title: Christmas Gift
data.text: We visited Liquid Smoke to purchase a gift for a family member. The service was impeccable! Neither of us smoke so we had no idea what we were doing. His dad loved the cigars!

data.title: Visit to Liquid Smoke
data.text: An old high school friend came for a visit. We went to liquid smoke to smoke some stogies. Relaxing time with an old friend

data.title: Unique, mellow place to relax
data.text: Liquid Smoke is a great, relaxing spot to have a drink and visit with friends. It's a very unique place with a good selection of beer and bottled drinks.  The staff is always friendly. Some nights they have live music. You can also sit outside when the weather is nice. Check out the bathroom!

owner_response.author: Mike L, Owner at Liquid Smoke, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hey thanks for dropping by we are so glad you had a good time at Liquid Smoke!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent chill bar
data.text: Just stumbled across this place on a Friday and was super happy.  They have nice comfortable chairs, good beer, and specials.  Any one of these would be good by me, but having all three was great.  They had a local band come in and play, and although they were unknowns they were fantastic.  The bathroom is real funky - make sure to check it out.  If you are a non-smoker be ready because you will come out smelling like smoke - the only real downside I could find.

owner_response.author: Mike L, Owner at Liquid Smoke, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for your kind words, so happy you enjoyed your visit to Liquid Smoke. I hope the rest of your time spent in Murfreesboro was just as enjoyable!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The essential downtown bar!
data.text: Liquid Smoke is the best little bar in the boro! Excellent beer selection, for starters... It rocks a casual funky feeling that hosts good examples of local color with memorably unique bathroom.
